name: There's Death All Around Us
description:
You are stuck in a house and you need to go through a few levels to escape.

You are not alone, but don't worry, they can't hurt you if you look at them.

Submission to the Matt Aspland Summer Game Jam.

If you decide to record a video and post it on Youtube for this game, make sure to send it to me. Also give this a rating.

Game Made By Ti-Noir
